statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 1 , -2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - x + 5 , -2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - x + 5 , 4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 3 , 24 \, x^{3} + 25 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x - 11\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
